mapper.sql: select month, pay, income, balance from account_bill
mapper.select: SELECT id,account_name "accountName" from account_account ORDER BY order_num

SELECT LEFT(m.money_date, 7) "money", c.class_name "name", IFNull(sum(m.money), 0) "value", c.status "status" from account_account a inner join account_user_account ua on a.id = ua.account_id inner join account_money m on a.id = m.account_id inner join account_class c on c.id = m.class_id AND m.deleted = 0 where left(m.money_date, 7) = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and m.is_total = 0 and ua.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY LEFT(m.money_date, 7), class_name, c.status

select sum(if(c.status = '1', m.money, 0)) as moneyIncome, sum(if(c.status = '2', m.money, 0)) as moneyPay, sum(if(c.status = '3', m.money, 0)) as moneyIgnore, money_date as moneyDate from account_account a inner join account_user_account ua on a.id = ua.account_id inner join account_money m on a.id = m.account_id inner join account_class c on c.id = m.class_id WHERE is_total = 0 and ua.user_id = #{userId} and money_date like CONCAT( #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') GROUP BY money_date

select c.class_name as name, sum(m.money) as value,c.`status` as status from account_class c left join account_money m on c.id = m.class_id where m.account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and m.deleted = 0 and m.is_total = 0 group by c.id, c.class_name,c.`status`
